content: **sign up for my mailing list for exclusive coupons crochet alongs and more here 1 ** *you can also find my full youtube tutorial on my channel @curiouspapaya notes *version 2 of this pattern includes updated steps on the tail as well as modification notes for making this in plush yarn *we will be working in a spiral *measurements 4 in x 2 in 10 16 cm x 5 08 cm *this pattern includes assembly for both positions laying a and standing b *this is an intermediate level pattern because of the tail *follow me in insta 2 for the latest pattern releases 1 https //view flodesk com/pages/63d4ba29de520bd60dc33f80 2 https //www instagram com/curiouspapaya
